thread.title: Cop Killed, 30 People Injured in Bogotá Blast | OSINT
thread.title_full: Cop Killed, 30 People Injured in Bogotá Blast | OSINT

title: Cop Killed, 30 People Injured in Bogotá Blast | OSINT
text:
Cop Killed, 30 People Injured in Bogotá Blast Cop Killed, 30 People Injured in Bogotá Blast This post was originally published here: post 

Authorities search for evidence Sunday at the site of an explosion in Bogota, Colombia. Arwa Gunja 
The blast comes amid ongoing — and sometimes violent — protests over bullfighting in Bogotá. The sport was outlawed in 2012, but three years later the country’s highest court ended the ban, calling bullfighting a cultural heritage. 
The sport resumed last month to large protests and a police response that included pepper spray and tear gas, 
The Guardian reported . 
A witness told NBC News that Sunday’s blast, in the city’s Macarena neighborhood, was strong enough to shatter glass on the 17th floor of a building across the street. 
Reuters reported that most of the injured were police officers. In a Twitter post from a hospital, Peñalosa said four of them lost an eye. Share this:
